title: Parted Magic 2012_04_21 i486
description: The Parted Magic OS employs core programs of GParted and Parted to handle partitioning tasks with ease, while featuring other useful software (e.g. Partimage, TestDisk, Truecrypt, Clonezilla, G4L, SuperGrubDisk, ddrescue, etcÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡Ã‚Âª) and an excellent set of info to benefit the user.
